SELECT ui.uuid as uid, ui.username, us.realname, s.ip, s.route_name, s.gmt_create FROM contest c, session s LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ui.uuid = s.uid LEFT JOIN user_sign us ON ui.uuid = us.uid
(s.gmt_create BETWEEN c.start_time AND c.end_time) AND c.id = #{cid}
AND (ui.username like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") OR us.realname like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") OR s.ip like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%"))
AND (ui.username not like CONCAT("%",#{unkeyword},"%") AND us.realname not like CONCAT("%",#{unkeyword},"%") AND s.ip not like CONCAT("%",#{unkeyword},"%"))
ORDER BY s.gmt_create DESC, ui.username, s.ip
